title: Artificial intelligence-enabled precision medicine for inflammatory skin diseases
details: A Tang, M Wei, A Haemel, C La, M Sirota, EY Lee - arXiv preprint arXiv:2505.09527, 2025
abstract: Recent advances in artificial intelligence (AI) and multimodal data collection are revolutionizing dermatology. Generative AI and machine learning approaches offer opportunities to enhance the diagnosis and treatment of inflammatory skin diseases …
